attributes.action: amend the law to allow the gating of private alleyways with only significant majority consent, instead of 100% acceptance.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Residents are encountering problems where one individual can veto the installation of a gate to a private alleyway providing access to the rear or side of properties, creating continuing security problems. This change to the law could permit the enhanced security of significant numbers of householders.
